extension.name: Logo | Imager | Hover - Gantry Particle (Hydrogen)
extension.author: Andreas Kar
extension.description:
Logo | Imager | Hover - Particle for Gantry Framework

 Andreas Kar (andreas.kar@gmx.at)

NOTE: This particle is installed for the Gantry Hydrogen.
If you want to install the particle on a different Gantry template, you must manually copy the two files logo-image-hover.yaml and logo-image-hover.html.twig to /templates/[TEMPLATE]/custom/particles.
Moreover, you have to copy _logo-image-hover.scss to /templates/[TEMPLATE]/custom/scss and logo-image-hover.js to /templates/[TEMPLATE]/custom/js.
